verbs.description: Donald Trump [V: is] escalating his beef with Walt Disney Co. Chief Executive Officer Bob Iger , marking the latest clash between the president and a corporate chieftain .
[ARG0: Donald Trump] is [V: escalating] [ARG1: his beef with Walt Disney Co. Chief Executive Officer Bob Iger] , [ARGM-ADV: marking the latest clash between the president and a corporate chieftain] .
[ARG0: Donald Trump] is escalating his beef with Walt Disney Co. Chief Executive Officer Bob Iger , [V: marking] [ARG1: the latest clash between the president and a corporate chieftain] .
